title: The scheme plot and the tolerated structures as mentioned above falling in the alignment of the road shall be relocated in the same administrative ward
clause_text: The scheme plot and the tolerated structures as mentioned above falling in the alignment of the road shall be relocated in the same administrative ward.
section: Removal and re-accommodation of tolerated /protected structures falling in the alignment of road: -
